杋字的基本解释

杋
fán
古书上说的一种树，俗称“水桴木”。

杋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fán］
［《集韻》符咸切，平凡，奉。］
木名。其皮俗称水桴。

杋字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　杋； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页511第08
【集韻】【類篇】符咸切【玉篇】扶嚴切，?音凡。木名。俗呼此木皮曰水桴木。　又【類篇】甫凡切。義同。

杋字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
杋字的起名意思

木名。其皮俗称水桴。

Basic explanation of words
杋
fán
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books, commonly known as "water sacred wood".
杋
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fán］
["Ji Yun" Fu Xianqie, ordinary, bong. ]
Wooden name. Its skin is commonly known as water.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　杋; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 511 08
[Ji Yun] [Class Chapter] Fu Xianqie [Jade Chapter] Strictly cut,? Yin Fan. Wooden name. This veneer is commonly called water sacred wood.　[Classes] Fu Fanqie again. The same meaning.
